props.locationStrategy: A function used to specifies how the component should position relative to its activator.
props.offset: Increases distance from the target. When passed as a pair of numbers, the second value shifts anchor along the side and away from the target.
props.stickToTarget: Enables the overlay content to go off-screen when scrolling (and changes default viewport margin to 0px, unless **viewport-margin** is defined).
props.viewportMargin: Sets custom viewport margin for the overlay content. Defaults to 12px (or 0px when **stick-to-target** is present).
